Title: Orghotts Daemonspew
Legend: Orghotts Daemonspew is a driven warlord determined to earn Nurgle’s ultimate favour. In battle, he lights as a merciless reaper, the Rolaxes striking down foe after foe like wheat before the scythe.
Intro: Orghotts Daemonspew is armed with the Rotaxes.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Contagium Overlord

Rules.Name: Warmaster
Rules.Rule: WARMASTER: If this unit is included in a Maggotkin of Nurgle army, it is treated as a general even if it is not the model picked to be the army’s general.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Pox Maggoth, Whippermaw, is armed with a Grasping Tongue and Monstrous Claws.

Rules.Name: Acid Ichor
Rules.Fluff: Whenever Orghotts's flesh is cut open, a gout of daemonic ichor spews out with shocking force. Its vitriolic potency is enough to burn through steel and dissolve the flesh beneath.
Rules.Rule: If an unmodified ward roll for this unit is 6, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit. That enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Rules.Name: Lord Of Nurgle
Rules.Fluff: Orghotts is a mighty champion of the Grandfather and demands unquestioning obedience from his devoted followers.
Rules.Rule: Lord of Nurgle: Once per turn, this unit can issue a command to a friendly MORTAL MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE unit without a command point being spent.
